attributes.action: order Michael Martin to repay to the public purse the costs incurred when he used the government lawyers to try to block an attempt by taxpayers to get MPs expenses details released into the public domain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is obvious now that Michael Martin was, like David MacLean, doing everything (at no cost to himself) to ensure that MPs expense claims should be withheld from the people who were funding the debacle.  That he used the government lawyers, at taxpayers expense, to do that was a disgusting attempt to keep his own abuses of the system under wraps.  Since he has now been found out he should be required to repay the costs of that action to the taxpayer.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
